title: (x) 50s retro script - Magneto {Dav}
content:
If you know the name of this fat retro script, or know something similar, please let me know. I've found some great thin scripts, but I really like this heavy one.  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020110203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/header_home.gif)
author: letsgobuffs

comments.content:
' [Magneto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020110203/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Magneto)', by Leslie Cabarga.

_( Welcome to Typophile, Stephanie, but, You should have posted this in [the dedicated 'Type ID' part of Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020110203/http:/typophile.com/forum/29), by the way. )_

Dav
